title: The Thermostat War Escalation
setting: Greenfield Accounting, main office, Friday 8 AM
premise: Someone put a lockbox over the office thermostat overnight, trapping it at 60 degrees. The lockbox was installed sometime between 6 PM Thursday and 7 AM Friday. Only someone with a hex wrench could have mounted it.

suspects.name: Victor Huang
suspects.motive: Keeps a personal space heater that was just banned by the office manager
suspects.alibi: I left at 5:30 PM Thursday and went to my son's school play at Lincoln Elementary. The show started at 7 PM and ran until 9. I drove straight home after.

suspects.name: Martha Gibbs
suspects.motive: Has been vocal about keeping the office cooler to save on energy costs
suspects.alibi: I worked until 6 PM, then went to dinner with my sister at Romano's downtown. We were there from 6:30 to about 8:30. I have the receipt.

suspects.name: Kevin Torres
suspects.motive: Tired of getting complaints about the temperature every single day
suspects.alibi: I left at 4 PM for a doctor's appointment. After that, I picked up my daughter from daycare. We were home all evening. I never came back to the office.

suspects.name: Diane Park
suspects.motive: Constantly cold and wanted to prove the thermostat needed a permanent setting
suspects.alibi: I stayed late working on tax returns until about 7:30 PM. Then I packed up my laptop, walked out the front door, and drove straight home.

clues.title: Wi-Fi Connection Log
clues.content: The office network log shows Diane's personal phone connected to the office Wi-Fi from 5:10 PM to 10:47 PM Thursday. Her phone never disconnected during that entire window.

clues.title: Maintenance Supply Check
clues.content: The lockbox is a commercial-grade unit sold only at specialty hardware stores. Kevin confirmed a hex wrench set is kept in the facilities closet on the second floor.

clues.title: Building Access Log
clues.content: The key-card log shows four exits after 4 PM Thursday but only one re-entry at 9:15 PM. The building's front door auto-locks at 6 PM.
